tree.name: Kris Murray
tree.tradeDescription: 4-team trade: POR sent Josh Hart to NYK for #23 pick (Kris Murray), Cam Reddish, Arcidiacono, Thybulle; also sent picks to PHI and CHA
tree.note: Iowa forward, drafted with NYK's 1st round pick acquired in Josh Hart 4-team trade (Feb 2023)

assetsGivenUp.name: Josh Hart
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: POR sent CJ McCollum to NOP for Josh Hart, Nickeil Alexander-Walker, Satoransky, Louzada, picks
assetsGivenUp.note: Villanova guard, acquired from New Orleans in CJ McCollum trade. Sent to NYK for Kris Murray pick.

assetsGivenUp.name: CJ McCollum
assetsGivenUp.note: Lehigh guard, drafted #10 overall by POR in 2013. Franchise cornerstone for 9 years.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2029 POR 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: POR own 2029 2nd, sent to PHI in 4-team Hart trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Sent to CHA in 4-team Hart trade
